Series XI: Broadcasts and Public Events
Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Subseries XI.D: Radio and Television Appearances
Subseries XI.D: Radio and Television Appearances

This subseries contains recordings of radio and television appearances by members of the Communist Party. Between the early 1950s to the late 1990s Party members were frequently interviewed on radio and TV. Recordings feature media appearances as well as variety of Communist Party campaign materials, which aired in support of Gus Hall and Jarvis Tyner's campaigns during the 1972 and 1976 Presidential elections as well as for Gus Hall and Angela Davis' 1980 and 1984 election campaigns. Audio from radio and television documentaries recorded by Party members are also included in this series.
